author: PTI
title: Congress criticises BJP for 'politicising' Ram Temple ceremony | Politics
text: Congress criticises BJP for 'politicising' Ram Temple ceremony [PTI](/pti-stories)| Pathanamthitta | Updated: 29-12-2023 17:51 IST | Created: 29-12-2023 17:51 IST - Country: - India Amidst indecision within the party over the invitation extended to its top leaders to attend the consecration ceremony of the Ram Temple in Ayodhya, the Congress on Friday criticised the BJP, alleging that the saffron party was turning the religious event into a party programme. AICC General Secretary in charge of organisation K C Venugopal said that senior Congress leaders, including Sonia Gandhi and Mallikarjun Kharge, have been invited to the Ram Temple consecration ceremony, and added that they would decide at an ''appropriate time'' whether to attend it. Talking to reporters, Venugopal said the senior leaders have received a personal invitation for the January 22 function. ''They will take a stand on their own. It's not a matter in which we have to express our opinion in public. They will take a stand when the time comes,'' Venugopal said. He noted that the Congress party has a clear-cut stand on such matters, and it functions accordingly. ''We will express our stand after discussing in our party forums and take a decision,'' he added. Venugopal criticised the BJP government, questioning ''whether it was right to turn such an event into a function of a party or a government''. His reaction came amid increasing uncertainty within the Congress regarding the political stance on the invitation for its national leadership to attend the consecration ceremony of the Ram Temple. Besides Gandhi and Kharge, the party's leader in the Lok Sabha Adhir Ranjan Chowdhury has also been invited. The CPI(M) has already declared that its representatives will not attend the ceremony, calling it a political move by the BJP ahead of the general elections that are to be held in a few months. The Ram Temple in Ayodhya is scheduled to be inaugurated on January 22. Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath, and more than 6,000 people are expected to attend the grand 'Pran Pratishtha' ceremony. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) ALSO READ [Congressional group demands probe into Beijing's role in violence against protesters on US soil](/article/politics/2745290-congressional-group-demands-probe-into-beijings-role-in-violence-against-protesters-on-us-soil) [Colombian congressional panel sets probe into president over alleged campaign finance misdeeds](/article/politics/2745366-colombian-congressional-panel-sets-probe-into-president-over-alleged-campaign-finance-misdeeds) [Sports News Roundup: Larry Doby, pioneering Black baseball star, given Congressional Gold Medal; Soccer-Turkish leagues to resume next week after attack on referee and more](/article/sports-games/2745587-sports-news-roundup-larry-doby-pioneering-black-baseball-star-given-congressional-gold-medal-soccer-turkish-leagues-to-res) [Parliament security breach: Congress to stage protest in Mysore and Bengaluru against BJP MP Pratap Simha](/article/headlines/2745419-parliament-security-breach-congress-to-stage-protest-in-mysore-and-bengaluru-against-bjp-mp-pratap-simha) [Sports News Roundup: Larry Doby, pioneering Black baseball star, given Congressional Gold Medal; Golf-Rahm to stay away from public events after joining LIV Golf and more](/article/sports-games/2745411-sports-news-roundup-larry-doby-pioneering-black-baseball-star-given-congressional-gold-medal-golf-rahm-to-stay-away-from-p)

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: The digital currency platform Enet Crypto Center Limited has gained favor among global users, featuring a unique user fund security system. | User | times-online.com
text: On December 20th, in a social media user-initiated poll for technology exchanges, Enet Crypto Center Limited (hereinafter referred to as Enet) won the favor of the majority of users. It ranked at the forefront in this event, thanks to its security and compliance. This indicates that Enet has allowed global users to experience secure and reliable digital asset trading services. It has gradually gained recognition in the market and has bolstered confidence in the platform to drive a more stable, secure, and reliable blockchain transaction system. Trust is a scarce factor in current information transmission, a necessary element in building a digital mirror world, and the cornerstone of achieving real and credible digital transformation. Therefore, Enet prioritizes user fund security. Its independently developed system kernel-level security adopts an advanced multi-layer, multi-cluster system architecture. It integrates advanced technologies such as sharded storage and DAG technology into the multi-layered architecture of the exchange, significantly enhancing the system's security, stability, and scalability. In terms of security, Enet has made more than one attempt. It is fully qualified, based on blockchain smart contract security. By empowering the financial field through blockchain, it comprehensively and multi-dimensionally ensures asset security. With strong R&D capabilities, anti-risk pricing mechanisms, risk reserve funds, and tiered reduction mechanisms, it achieves bank-level security risk control. Its goal is to ensure the protection of user data privacy, covering the entire data protection and governance system, and reducing transaction costs and risks. Enet is well aware that technology needs continuous promotion by talents. The platform has gathered a group of encryption experts and security teams, with over hundreds of security personnel. They conduct in-depth market research, analysis, investment, and incubation in the encryption industry, study the latest hacker attack methods, and help establish a fair power structure in the Web3.0 system, placing security and privacy at the core of the system. Enet meets the long-term investment and trading needs of users. It has always adhered to the development concept of "security" and "compliance." The platform equipment is high-performance servers selected through screening. Its risk management includes extensive order systems and trading tools for users. It provides the industry with relatively standardized solutions, also hoping to promote the industry's compliance and mainstreaming with its actions. Enet builds a secure platform for investors at the most fundamental level, creating a unique compliance barrier that allows users to fully control their digital assets. This is why Enet can better cope with various uncertainties in the industry and maintain a leading position in the market. Enet also plans to increase efforts to protect asset security and shield global digital trade investments. Disclaimer: The information provided in this press release is not a solicitation for investment, or intended as investment advice, financial advice, or trading advice. It is strongly recommended that you practice due diligence (including consultation with a professional financial advisor) before investing in or trading securities and cryptocurrency. Media Contact Company Name: Enet Crypto Center Limited Contact Person: Janes Email: Send Email Country: Singapore Website: https://enetcoin.cc/

author: Redazione ANSA
title: Patti Smith sviene e cade a terra durante esibizione in Brasile
text:
Patti Smith è caduta a terra durante una performance in Brasile. Smith, 78 anni, si stava esibendo con il gruppo berlinese Soundwalk Collective, in cui recita i suoi scritti con un accompagnamento musicale. Lo riporta il Guardian.
Smith è svenuta circa 30 minuti dopo l'inizio dell'evento, mentre leggeva un articolo sulla crisi climatica. Dopo essere caduta, è stata portata nel backstage su una sedia a rotelle.
Smith è tornata sul palco per scusarsi di aver dovuto interrompere la performance. "Purtroppo il dottore ha detto che non posso finire, mi sento male", ha detto alla folla dalla sedia a rotelle.
Riproduzione riservata © Copyright ANSA

author: Toponotomalasuerte
title: #57 Un atentado islamista durante la misa de Navidad deja más de 160 cristianos asesinados en Nigeria
text:

mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#0](c0#c-0) Ese titular es tendencioso y confuso, y probablemente seas consciente. Y además, el factor religioso no es el único relevante, y tampoco está plenamente confirmado.

La reciente matanza sucedida en Navidad confirma lo que anuncian las estadísticas: el cristianismo es la religión más perseguida en el mundo. Y no se limita solamente a esta región de África, sino que ocurre en Asia y Medio Oriente. Solo una lo pudo obtener porque su salud le impedía subir al avión donde la deportaban.
Todo ello, mientras las pateras siguen llegando a España, posiblemente con insurgentes tan radicales como los que masacran a los cristianos en Nigeria y sin el amparo para los cristianos que huyen de estos.

author: Chrissy Newton
title: NASA Bridges the Gap Between High Fashion and Space Exploration with New Prada-Designed Spacesuits
text: From runway chic to the future of space mechanical engineering, Italian fashion house Prada has unveiled new designs for the next generation of spacesuits. In partnership with space industry leaders Axiom Space, the atypical collaboration is now helping NASA bridge the gap between high fashion and space exploration by creating new spacesuits for the forthcoming Artemis III lunar mission. Scheduled for a targeted launch in September of 2026, the Artemis III lunar mission will mark the first time a woman and a person of color will set foot on the Moon in the first crewed lunar exploration since December 1972. Outside of fashion, diversity, and culture, the NASA mission aims to land astronauts near the lunar South Pole , helping to push the goal forward of creating a long-term human presence on the moon and helping to prepare for similar explorations of Mars in the years ahead. NASA is no stranger to working with patterns designed with women in mind. The first modern spacesuit was crafted by a group of designers at the International Latex Corporation (ILC), best known for fabricating and constructing bras and girdles in the 1960s. First worn by Neil Armstrong during the Apollo 11 mission, designers created the A7L to protect astronauts from the harsh conditions of space and the lunar surface. The A7L spacesuit used materials such as neoprene, Beta cloth (designed to protect astronauts from high temperatures), and aluminized mylar. It was a complicated spacesuit design with several layers to ensure protection, motility, and pressure. Lorenzo Bertelli, Prada Group Chief Marketing Officer and Head of Corporate Social Responsibility, said in a statement that “Going beyond our limits is one of the company’s values that perfectly reflects the spirit of the Prada brand and my parents’ vision.” “I’m very proud of the result we’re showing today, which is just the first step in a long-term collaboration with Axiom Space,” Beretlli added. “We’ve shared our expertise on high-performance materials, features, and sewing techniques, and we learned a lot.” “I’m sure we’ll continue to explore new challenges, broaden our horizons, and build new scenarios together,” Bertelli said. The first look at the new spacesuit designs was revealed at the International Astronautical Congress in Milan and presented to the public on October 18, with a fashion installation at the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II as an extension of the IAC event. “Our elite teams have redefined spacesuit development, establishing new pathways to innovative solutions and applying a state-of-the-art design approach for the AxEMU,” said Matt Ondler, Axiom Space President, in a press release. “We have broken the mold. The Axiom Space-Prada partnership has set a new foundational model for cross-industry collaboration, further expanding what’s possible in commercial space.” With the help of Prada’s knowledge and innovation in raw materials and designs alongside the experience of the Axiom Space team, the first human exploration of the lunar south pole will bring NASA and space tourism enthusiasts around the globe closer to traveling the cosmos in style. “We are pioneering a new era in space exploration where partnerships are imperative to the commercialization of space,” said Russell Ralston, Executive Vice President of Extravehicular Activity, Axiom Space. “Partnerships build a strong, cohesive team, enabling industry experts to provide cutting-edge technology, specialized products, and services to drive innovation.” “For the first time, we are leveraging expertise in other industries to craft a better solution for space.” Chrissy Newton is a PR professional and founder of VOCAB Communications. She currently appears on The Discovery Channel and Max and hosts the Rebelliously Curious podcast, which can be found on The Debrief’s YouTube Channel on all audio podcast streaming platforms. Follow her on X: @ChrissyNewton and at chrissynewton.com .

author: Frankie Stockes
title: Video: MSNBC Says Rights Come from Government, Not God, and You’re a Christian Nationalist if You Think Otherwise
text: Last Updated on February 23, 2024 An MSNBC panelist on the All In with Chris Hayes program claimed that the rights of Americans don’t come from God, but rather from the federal government, specifically naming Congress and the Supreme Court as the arbiters of human rights. Those who echo America’s Founding Fathers in believing that human rights come from God and not man, are Trump-aligned Christian Nationalists, she said. Politico reporter Heidi Przybyla, who has obsessively reported on her own [claims](https://web.archive.org/web/20240223092051/https://www.politico.com/news/2024/02/20/donald-trump-allies-christian-nationalism-00142086) that Christian Nationalists are preparing to seize control of the United States, appeared this week on MSNBC’s All In program, which was being guest hosted by Michael Steele, a failed RNC Chairman and anti-Trumper. While there, Przybyla claimed that the rights of Americans, and all human beings for that matter, do not come from God, but instead come from the government. “The one thing that unites all of them, because there’s many different groups orbiting Trump, the thing that unites them as Christian Nationalists, not Christians by the way because Christian Nationalism is very different, is that they believe that our rights as Americans, as all human beings, don’t come from any earthly authority,” Przybyla said. Christian Nationalists, she went on, believe that their basic rights “don’t come from Congress, they don’t come from the Supreme Court, they come from God.” Hear the Remarks in the [Video Clip](https://twitter.com/WadeMiller_USMC/status/1761015125673222572) Below: Here [@MSNBC]helpfully makes it clear their disdain for Christians in America. She says that if you believe that your rights come from God, you aren’t a Christian, you are a Christian nationalist. Somehow they seem to not mention that our own founding documents make this… [pic.twitter.com/WTLMqcqTzg] — Wade Miller (@WadeMiller_USMC) [February 23, 2024] The absurd remarks from Heidi Przybyla come as Christ-hating uni-party members launch an all-out anti-Christian offensive against Trump’s 2024 presidential campaign, as Christian Americans, and other people of faith, including Muslims, finally begin standing up to the radically globalist, pro-trans, pro-usury ruling class. At a recent rally in Tennessee, 45th President Trump pledged to establish a new task force to fight anti-Christian bias, and vowed that “No one will be touching the Cross of Christ under the Trump administration.” Trump also told supporters who gathered at the Nashville rally, a city in which a trans terrorist slaughtered 6 Christians, including 3 children last year, that the renewed Trump Administration “will protect God in our public square.”

author: VNExplorer
title: 5 minis de Sephora que vale la pena tener en tu makeup bag
text:
Si eres fan del mundo del makeup , sabrás que no existe nada mejor que entrar al paraíso de la belleza: Sephora , pues existen un sinfÍn de productos y marcas en diversas presentaciones que enloquecen a cualquiera. Uno de los que más llaman la atención es la versión mini de los best sellers de algunas firmas. Los productos mini son obviamente más pequeños y por lo tanto mucho más livianos, lo que los hace ideales para viajar, ya que ocupan menos espacio y son generalmente más baratos que los de tamaño completo. Si te gusta estar probando nuevos productos a menudo y no quieres gastar de más, estas versiones minis son para ti. Te presentamos cinco productos en esta presentación que tienes que tener.
5 minis de Sephora que valen la pena Prisme Libre Loose Powder Mini de Givenchy Mini Box O-powder Hoola De Benefit Rímel Better Than Sex Waterproof de Too Faced
Sí, así es, ¡los polvos sueltos de 4 colores de Givenchy también tienen su versión mini! Perfecciona y fija tu maquillaje con un simple producto para que tu piel se vea perfecta, están disponibles en cinco armonías de tonos luminosos, cada polvo combina un cuarteto de los pigmentos más radiantes y sutiles de la marca y tiene acabado luminoso, mate y transparente. ¡Tienes que tenerlo! Uno de los best sellers de Benefit que no puedes pasar por alto es el Hoola bronzer , este bronceador de polvo compacto es ideal para todo tipo de piel con un acabado mate que crea un aspecto natural y cálido. Aunque sea versión mini, te durará muchísimo, te lo aseguramos. Uno de los mejores rímeles de la historia tiene su versión mini y se trata nada más y nada menos que el Better Than Sex Waterproof, su fórmula engrosa, alarga y riza las pestañas dando volumen extremo y dramatismo a prueba de agua. Al igual que en su tamaño normal, cuenta con un aplicador en forma de reloj de arena que permite que las pestañas se enchinen a la perfección. Si viajas a la playa, ¡no dudes en llevarlo!
Sombras Natasha Denona Lip Injection de Too Faced
Si te gusta maquillarte los ojos, estas paletas son totalmente garantía, pues cuentan con cinco colores de ensueño para recrear looks con increíbles combinaciones; las paletas tienen desde tonos neutros, cromados y hasta metálicos. Su fórmula es ultra pigmentante y te durarán todo el día. El famosísimo lip injection de Too Faced tiene su versión mini ahora acompañado de otros dos tonos rosados que no querrás soltar. Los plumpers tienen un efecto inmediato, hidratan, duran mucho y dejarán tus labios perfectos. El tamaño de estos mini size products son perfectos para viajar y te permitirán completar un look completo sobre la marcha, además de que te dan la facilidad de probar nuevas cosas sin tener que gastar mucho. ¡Pruébalos!

author: Elizabeth Campbell - Fort Worth Star-Telegram (TNS)
title: Carmelite nuns block Vatican-appointed representative from entering Arlington, Texas, monastery | Nation/World | gazettextra.com
text: The legal battle between the [Carmelite nuns](http://www.carmelnuns.com/index.html) of the Monastery of the Most Holy Trinity and Bishop Michael Olson may be over after a second lawsuit was dismissed on Wednesday, but another fight involving orders from the Vatican over who has authority over the nuns is brewing. On Wednesday and Thursday, a representative appointed by Rome was turned away when she tried to enter the monastery to deliver letters from the Vatican to the nine cloistered nuns. They do not want to be governed or managed by the Association of Christ the King, the Carmelite order appointed to govern and manage operations of the monastery, according to the Catholic Diocese of Fort Worth. kAmp DA@ 2:=[ “%96 s:@46D6 5@6D ?@E 2EE6C 36EH66?
